      • setLearnerMaster

        public void setLearnerMaster(String learnerMaster)
        从接口复制的说明: ObserverMXBean
        requests the Observer switch to a new learner master
        指定者:
        setLearnerMaster 在接口中 ObserverMXBean
        参数:
